knowledgeCard.title: Dietary Options at the Parks
knowledgeCard.content: Disney is exceptional with dietary accommodations â€” inform your server of any allergies. Most restaurants can handle gluten-free, vegan, and allergy-friendly meals. Use the My Disney Experience app to filter by dietary need. Universal is also improving but Disney leads here.

questions.question: If you had 100 points to spend on food categories, how would you split them?

knowledgeCard.title: Must-Try Park Snacks
knowledgeCard.content: Disney's famous snacks: Dole Whip (pineapple soft serve), turkey legs, churros, Mickey pretzels, and the grey stuff (it's delicious!). Universal has Butterbeer (frozen or regular), and Epic Universe will have amazing new food. Snacks can easily add $30-50/day per person.
